articles.title: Serena Williams U.S. Open live updates - The Washington Post
articles.description: Serena Williams looks to continue her magical run in Flushing Meadows. Follow along for live updates.
articles.content: Serena Williams continued to dominate the second set, taking a 3-0 lead against Ajla Tomljanovic after dropping the first set, 7-5, despite being two points from winning while on serve.

articles.title: 'Diamond rain' on giant icy planets could be more common than previously thought - Phys.org
articles.description: A new study has found that "diamond rain," a long-hypothesized exotic type of precipitation on ice giant planets, could be more common than previously thought.
articles.content: The new study provides a more complete picture of how diamond rain forms on other planets and, here on Earth, could lead to a new way of fabricating nanodiamonds, which have a very wide array of appl… [+567 chars]

articles.title: College Football Playoff to expand to include 12 teams no later than 2026 - CNN
articles.description: The College Football Playoff Board of Managers has unanimously approved expanding the current four-team playoff format to include 12 schools, the board announced Friday.
